category: Click Boards > Power management > USB-C PD
name: mikroe.click.usbcsource
short_description: USB-C Source Click is a compact add-on board that contains a standalone autonomous USB power delivery controller. This board features the STUSB4700, an independent USB power delivery controller optimized as a provider to negotiate a given amount of power to be sourced to an inquiring consumer device from STMicroelectronics.
